result.title: 379 Round Div2C
result.content:
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

const int N = 2e5 + 100;

int a[N], b[N], c[N], d[N], n, m, k, x, s;
long long ans = 5e18;

int main () {
    ios_base :: sync_with_stdio (0);
    cin.tie (0);
    cin >> n >> m >> k;

    cin >> x >> s;

    for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i)
        cin >> a[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i)
        cin >> b[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= k; ++i)
        cin >> c[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= k; ++i)
        cin >> d[i];
    a[0] = x;
    b[0] = 0;
    c[0] = 0;
    d[0] = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i <= m; ++i) {
        if (b[i] > s)
            continue;
        int ps = upper_bound (d, d + k + 1, s - b[i]) - d - 1;
        ans = min (ans, 1ll * a[i] * (n - c[ps]));
    }
    cout << ans;
    return 0;
}
